main_definition: To not meet expectations or standards, resulting in a lack of success.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Does not succeed or achieve the desired outcome.
meanings_and_examples.example: The student failed to pass the exam.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Inability to perform or accomplish a task effectively.
meanings_and_examples.example: His car's engine fails when he tries to start it on cold days.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Lack of success in achieving goals, objectives, or expectations.
meanings_and_examples.example: The project failed due to poor planning and execution.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not living up to a certain standard or expectation.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her performance at work fails to meet the company's quality standards.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A device or mechanism that stops working when put under stress, strain, or pressure.
meanings_and_examples.example: The safety valve on a boiler will fail if it is not properly maintained.
